long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Gauntlet is an attractive and interesting game right on the chrome extension. The gameplay is simple and dramatic. Start the game by pressing number 4, then play by moving and shooting monsters that will eat you. Press the space bar to shoot and move continuously to overcome monsters to win
